body_html:
I just found out that resetting the graph solves the problem of repeated call:

########################################### REPEAT:
tf.reset_default_graph()
...

However, this seems to me like an ugly workaround as it requires me to re-build the whole graph after each run.
Is there a better solution?
body_text:
I just found out that resetting the graph solves the problem of repeated call:
########################################### REPEAT:
tf.reset_default_graph()
...

However, this seems to me like an ugly workaround as it requires me to re-build the whole graph after each run.
Is there a better solution?
body:
I just found out that resetting the graph solves the problem of repeated call:
```
########################################### REPEAT:
tf.reset_default_graph()
...
```
However, this seems to me like an ugly workaround as it requires me to re-build the whole graph after each run.
Is there a better solution?
